typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SourceSystemID as integer '000',
		GlobalTransactionID as string,
		SourceSystemTransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		ReturnDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		RentalCost as decimal(10,0),
		LateFee as decimal(10,0),
		RewindFlag as boolean,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> adrenfc
source(output(
		SourceSystemID as integer '000',
		GlobalTransactionID as string,
		SourceSystemTransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		ReturnDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		RentalCost as decimal(10,0),
		LateFee as decimal(10,0),
		RewindFlag as boolean,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> adrentvan
adrenfc, adrentvan union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(input(
		SourceSystemID as string,
		GlobalTransactionID as string,
		SourceSystemTransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as string,
		ReturnDate as string,
		RentalCost as string,
		LateFee as string,
		RewindFlag as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['rentals.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> adrentalsfinal
